Please be aware that by following this verification process, your Clubcard account will be linked to the Tesco.com account currently active on this computer. If another person is currently logged onto their Tesco.com account, please log them out before continuing.
If you need to speak to a member of our Customer Services team for further assistance, please call us on 0800 59 16 88* or 0330 123 1688**
